price: 如果我意欲，我就把他们淹死，而他们没有任何援助者，他们将不获拯救；
arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum falā ṣarīkha lahum walā hum yunqadhūna
translations: (would be) a responder to a cry
